name: Astro's Adventure 1-1
description:
Astro's Adventure 1-1 is a vertical slice of a 3D adventure game inspired by SNES platformers.

Play as Astro in the search for his kidnapped dog Bandit! Find treasure and bash baddies in a quest to save your pup.

Includes a VR mode and plenty of options to tweak how you experience Astro's journey. Playable with keyboard, most game controllers (Playstation, Xbox controllers tested), and SteamVR compatible headsets.
